ccg-setinfo.name: This Side of Paradise
ccg-setinfo.game: Star Trek Collectible Card Game: Second Edition

card.name: Its Thinking is Chaotic
card.text: Place this dilemma on this mission. Randomly select a personnel. That personnel and each copy of that personnel loses all skills and abilities and gains the following ability: When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may choose this personnel instead. These effects last until the end of the mission attempt. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

card.name: Lending a Hand
card.text: Your opponent chooses two personnel to be stopped. Choose a personnel from your hand that you do not command who has a cost less than the total cost of those two personnel. You may place that personnel on this planet mission and have him or her join this mission attempt.

card.name: Losira
card.text: Your opponent names a personnel. Randomly select three personnel. Each named personnel selected is killed.

card.name: Parallel Romance
card.text: Randomly select two personnel to be stopped. For each personnel stopped by this dilemma, each of your personnel is attributes +1 until the end of this mission attempt.

card.name: Polywater Intoxication
card.text: If you have six or more personnel attempting this mission, this dilemma is cost +3. Choose a personnel to be stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: The Captain's 'Guest'
card.text: Your opponent names a keyword. Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has that keyword, they are all stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

card.name: The Charismatic Mister Kor
card.text: For each dilemma beneath this mission, this dilemma is cost -1. Randomly select a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

card.name: The Charming Mister Riker
card.text: For each dilemma beneath this mission, this dilemma is cost -1. Randomly select a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

card.name: The Gentleman Doctor McCoy
card.text: For each dilemma beneath this mission, this dilemma is cost -1. Randomly select a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

card.name: Warm Welcome
card.text: If you have six or more personnel attempting this mission, this dilemma is cost +3. Unless you have 3 {Cmd} personnel or 2 Officer, choose a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Watch Your Step
card.text: Unless you have Leadership, Security, and Cunning>34, or Telepathy and 2 Treachery, or 3 Honor, place this dilemma in your core. When you are about to draw a card, this dilemma's owner may remove this dilemma from the game to make you draw three cards instead and he or she examines those cards and chooses two of them to be discarded.

card.name: Deal With the Count Man
card.text: Decay: 3. (When there are three cards on this event, destroy it.) To play this event, you must command a Thief. Plays in your core. Name a personnel. At the start of each Execute Orders segment, each personnel who has that card title cannot use abilities, attributes, and skills until the end of each turn. At the start of each of your turns, place the top card of your deck on this event.

card.name: Mudd's Women
card.text: Plays in your core. When an opponent's dilemma is revealed, you may discard a card from hand to name a personnel. When that named personnel is randomly selected by that dilemma, you may place the top card of your deck on this event. At the start of each of your turns, you may take a card from this event to your hand to spend two additional counters this turn.

card.name: Raise the Stakes
card.text: Plays in your core. Each of your opponent's personnel are attributes +1. Each of your missions are worth 5 more points. When you are about to lose command of this event, remove it from the game instead.

card.name: A Q Scorned
card.text: Q. When a personnel that the player on your right commands begins a mission attempt, destroy your event to shuffle your dilemma pile and the opponent on your right chooses one: you may draw four extra dilemmas; or you may spend two extra on dilemmas.

card.name: A Royal Welcome
card.text: Order - Destroy your event that has a cost of 3 or more to make your opponent name a skill (except Acquisition, Intelligence, Law, or Telepathy). You may download a personnel who has that skill and place him or her at your headquarters mission where that personnel could be played. That personnel is attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

card.name: Old Feelings
card.text: Order - Stop two of your personnel to choose one: remove a dilemma that has no cards on it in your core from the game; or take a personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

card.name: Track Survivors
card.text: Engineer, Geology, Science, Transporters, and Cunning>32 or Diplomacy, Honor, Law, Leadership, and Integrity>30 When your personnel complete this mission, if none of them have an attribute >6, score 5 points.

card.name: Chalan Aroya (Accessible Restaurateur)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Honor {SD}Science {SD}Transporters When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may take a card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Neela (Misguided Activist)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Programming {SD}Treachery Assassin. Order - Remove a personnel in your discard pile from the game and return this personnel to her owner's hand to kill an opponent's personnel present who has a skill the removed personnel has.

card.name: Seven of Nine (Prodigal Daughter)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Engineer {SD}Exobiology {SD}Programming {SD}Science {SD}Treachery When your opponent's card is about to prevent your interrupt, you may give command of this personnel to an opponent to ignore that effect. If you do, choose a ship commanded by that opponent and place this personnel aboard that ship.

card.name: Korinas (Observer from the Obsidian Order)
card.text: {SD}Intelligence {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Security {SD}Treachery While this personnel is facing a dilemma, she and each {car} Intelligence personnel present adds his or her Cunning to his Integrity.

card.name: Luaran (Critical Coordinator)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Navigation {SD}Physics {SD}Treachery When you play this personnel, you may draw a card for each staffing requirement icon on your staffed {dom} ship.

card.name: Alynna Nechayev (Adamant Admiral)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Law {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Science {SD}Security Admiral. Order - Discard a {fed} personnel that you do not command from hand. This personnel gains an order ability from that personnel until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Jenna D'Sora (Veteran Security Officer)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Engineer {SD}Exobiology {SD}Security When this personnel begins a mission attempt, you may name a personnel. If that personnel is chosen or selected by a dilemma during this mission attempt, he or she is attributes +2 and gains Anthropology until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: Melora Pazlar (Independent Personality)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Navigation {SD}Programming {SD}Science While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may lose 5 points to choose one: make her gain two different skills on a personnel present; or make her gain an attribute on a personnel present. This effect lasts until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Naomi Wildman (Astrometrics Officer)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Engineer {SD}Honor {SD}Science While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may destroy your Temporal event that has a cost greater than or equal to the cost of that dilemma to make each random selection made by that dilemma your choice instead.

card.name: Nella Daren (Head of Stellar Cartography)
card.text: {SD}2 Astrometrics {SD}Honor {SD}Science When a personnel present is randomly selected to be killed, you may destroy an equipment this personnel is equipped with to stop that personnel instead.

card.name: Number One (Reputable Officer)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer {SD}Science You may play this personnel at cost +2 to choose up to three of your personnel in your opponents' brigs and place them at your headquarters mission.

card.name: Valeris (Co-Conspirator)
card.text: {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer {SD}Science {SD}Treachery Assassin. When you play this personnel, if you command three Treachery personnel, name a non-ship card. Each opponent searches his or her deck, places the named card in his or her discard pile, and shuffles and replaces his or her deck.

card.name: Watley (Recent Transfer)
card.text: {SD}Honor {SD}Medical {SD}Science You may play this personnel at cost +3 to name a personnel. Each opponent must choose a personnel he or she commands who has that title and return him or her to his or her owner's hand.

card.name: Leeta (Devoted Wife)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Honor When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, if you command Ferenginar, download a card and place it beneath your Ferenginar.

card.name: Quark (Lumba)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Honor {SD}Programming When you play this personnel, you may download a card and place it beneath your Ferenginar. When your Rule is about to be destroyed by a card an opponent owns, you may destroy your Rule instead.

card.name: Ch'Regha (Open-Minded)
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Exobiology {SD}Honor {SD}Medical Order - Stop this personnel aboard your {kli} ship at a {DQ} mission to place a Klingon at your Qo'noS aboard this ship.

card.name: Anastasia Komananov (Russian Seductress)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Intelligence {SD}Officer {SD}2 Physics Assassin. Infiltrator. When you play this personnel, you may take a Hologram from your discard pile into hand. When this personnel is killed by a dilemma, each player kills each copy of Kira Nerys that he or she commands.

card.name: Arandis (Risan Facilitator)
card.text: {SD}2 Anthropology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Geology {SD}Leadership When you play this personnel, each player may download a card.

card.name: M'Pella (Seductive Employee)
card.text: {SD}Acquisition {SD}Anthropology {SD}Exobiology When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, reveal the top card of your deck. If the cost of the revealed card matches the cost of that dilemma, it is prevented and overcome.

card.name: Marta (Delusional Seductress)
card.text: {SD}Acquisition {SD}Anthropology {SD}Medical Thief. When your Leadership personnel present is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may destroy one of your events to ignore its results and select again.

card.name: Rayna Kapec (Developing Android)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Engineer {SD}Medical {SD}Physics {SD}Programming {SD}Science When your non-Android personnel present is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard two Android personnel from hand to prevent that.

card.name: Sakonna (Puzzled Interrogator)
card.text: {SD}Geology {SD}Physics {SD}Transporters When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, if there are two {Maq} personnel present, that dilemma's owner must place two cards from hand on top of his or her deck in any order.

card.name: Ba'el (Naive Prisoner)
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Geology {SD}Honor {SD}Science When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, that dilemma's owner must discard a card at random from his or her hand.

card.name: Kalenna (Sentry)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Biology {SD}Intelligence {SD}Security When this personnel begins a mission attempt, you may discard an event from hand to name up to two unique personnel. While each of those personnel is not {na}, he or she cannot be randomly selected by dilemmas. This effect lasts until the end of this mission attempt.

card.name: Fiona McKenzie (Experienced Corporal)
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Security {SD}Transporters MACO. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if three MACO personnel are present with her, you may discard a card from hand to make a {sf} personnel present attributes +2 until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: Gannet Brooks (Undercover Operative)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Intelligence {SD}Programming {SD}Security While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard a {sf} personnel from hand to give her one of the discarded personnel's skills until the end of that mission attempt.

card.name: U.S.S. Sao Paulo (NCC-75633)
card.text: When your {DS9} personnel aboard this ship is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may stop that personnel instead.
